00036 template<typename TYPE, size_t SIZE> class array
00037 {
00038 protected:
00039     TYPE cont[SIZE];
00040     typedef TYPE *iterator;
00041     typedef const TYPE *const_iterator;
00042     iterator begin() {return cont;}
00043     const_iterator begin()const {return cont;}
00044     iterator end() {return cont + SIZE;}
00045     const_iterator end()const {return cont + SIZE;}
00046 };

00049 template < typename TYPE, size_t SIZE, typename CONTAINER = _internal::array<TYPE, SIZE> >
00050 class FixedVector: protected CONTAINER
00051 {
00052 public:
00053     typedef typename CONTAINER::iterator iterator;
00054     typedef typename CONTAINER::const_iterator const_iterator;
00055     typedef FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE, CONTAINER> this_class;
00056 protected:
00058     template<typename OP> this_class binaryOp ( const this_class &src )const {
00059         this_class ret;
00060         std::transform( CONTAINER::begin(), CONTAINER::end(), src.begin(), ret.begin(), OP() );
00061         return ret;
00062     }
00063     template<typename OP> this_class binaryOp( const TYPE &src )const {
00064         this_class ret;
00065         iterator dst = ret.begin();
00066         const OP op = OP();
00067 
00068         for ( const_iterator i = CONTAINER::begin(); i != CONTAINER::end(); i++, dst++ )
00069             *dst = op( *i, src );
00070 
00071         return ret;
00072     }
00073     template<typename OP> this_class unaryOp()const {
00074         this_class ret;
00075         std::transform( CONTAINER::begin(), CONTAINER::end(), ret.begin(), OP() );
00076         return ret;
00077     }
00078 public:
00080     // Contructor stuff
00082 
00086     FixedVector() {fill( TYPE() ); }
00087 
00091     FixedVector( const TYPE src[SIZE] ) {
00092         std::copy( src, src + SIZE, CONTAINER::begin() );
00093     }
00094 
00096     void fill( const TYPE &val ) {
00097         std::fill( CONTAINER::begin(), CONTAINER::end(), val );
00098     }
00099 
00101     // Accessors
00103     const TYPE &operator []( size_t idx )const {
00104         LOG_IF( idx >= SIZE, Debug, error ) << "Index " << idx << " exceeds the size of the vector (" << SIZE << ")";
00105         return CONTAINER::begin()[idx];
00106     }
00107     TYPE &operator []( size_t idx ) {
00108         LOG_IF( idx >= SIZE, Debug, error ) << "Index " << idx << " exceeds the size of the vector (" << SIZE << ")";
00109         return CONTAINER::begin()[idx];
00110     }

00113     // Comparison
00116     bool lexical_less( const this_class &src )const {
00117         const_iterator they = src.begin();
00118         const_iterator me = CONTAINER::begin();
00119 
00120         while ( me != CONTAINER::end() ) {
00121             if ( *they < *me ) return false;
00122             else if ( *me < *they ) return true;
00123 
00124             me++;
00125             they++;
00126         }
00127 
00128         return false;
00129     }
00131     bool lexical_less_reverse( const this_class &src )const {
00132         const_iterator they = src.end();
00133         const_iterator me = CONTAINER::end();
00134 
00135         while ( me != CONTAINER::begin() ) {
00136             me--;
00137             they--;
00138 
00139             if ( *they < *me ) return false;
00140             else if ( *me < *they ) return true;
00141         }
00142 
00143         return false;
00144     }
00146     bool operator==( const this_class &src )const {return std::equal( CONTAINER::begin(), CONTAINER::end(), src.begin() );}
00148     bool operator!=( const this_class &src )const {
00149         return !operator==( src );
00150     }
00160     bool fuzzyEqual( const this_class &other, TYPE thresh = 0 )const {
00161         const_iterator b = other.begin();
00162 
00163         for ( const_iterator a = CONTAINER::begin(); a != CONTAINER::end(); ++a, ++b ) {
00164             if ( ! util::fuzzyEqual( *a, *b, thresh ) )
00165                 return false;
00166         }
00167 
00168         return true;
00169     }

00176     this_class operator-( const this_class &src )const {return binaryOp<std::minus<TYPE>      >( src );}
00177     this_class operator+( const this_class &src )const {return binaryOp<std::plus<TYPE>       >( src );}
00178     this_class operator*( const this_class &src )const {return binaryOp<std::multiplies<TYPE> >( src );}
00179     this_class operator/( const this_class &src )const {return binaryOp<std::divides<TYPE>    >( src );}

00182     this_class operator+( const TYPE &src )const {return binaryOp<std::plus<TYPE>       >( src );}
00183     this_class operator*( const TYPE &src )const {return binaryOp<std::multiplies<TYPE> >( src );}
00184     this_class operator/( const TYPE &src )const {return binaryOp<std::divides<TYPE>    >( src );}

00187     const this_class negate()const {
00188         return unaryOp<std::negate<float> >();
00189     }

00195     TYPE dot( const this_class &vect )const {return std::inner_product( CONTAINER::begin(), CONTAINER::end(), vect.begin(), TYPE() );}
00200     TYPE sqlen()const {return dot( *this );}
00205     TYPE len()const {return std::sqrt( sqlen() );}

00217     const this_class &norm()throw( std::invalid_argument ) {
00218         const TYPE d = len();
00219 
00220         if ( d == 0 )throw( std::invalid_argument( "Trying to normalize a vector of length 0" ) );
00221         else *this = *this / d;
00222 
00223         return *this;
00224     }

00230     TYPE product()const {
00231         TYPE ret = 1;
00232 
00233         for ( const_iterator i = CONTAINER::begin(); i != CONTAINER::end(); i++ )
00234             ret *= *i;
00235 
00236         return ret;
00237     }

00243     TYPE sum() {
00244         TYPE ret = 0;
00245 
00246         for ( iterator i = CONTAINER::begin(); i != CONTAINER::end(); i++ )
00247             ret += *i;
00248 
00249         return ret;
00250     }

00261     template<class InputIterator> void copyFrom( InputIterator iter_start, InputIterator iter_end ) {
00262         LOG_IF( size_t( std::distance( iter_start, iter_end ) ) > SIZE, Runtime, error )
00263                 << "Copying " << std::distance( iter_start, iter_end ) << " Elements into a vector of the size " << SIZE;
00264         std::copy( iter_start, iter_end, CONTAINER::begin() );
00265     }
00266     template<typename TYPE2, typename CONTAINER2> FixedVector( const FixedVector<TYPE2, SIZE, CONTAINER2> &src ) {
00267         src.copyTo( CONTAINER::begin() );
00268     }

00272         util::listToOStream( CONTAINER::begin(), CONTAINER::end(), out, "|", "<", ">" );

00277 template<typename TYPE>
00278 class vector4 : public FixedVector<TYPE, 4>
00279 {
00280 public:
00281     vector4() {}
00282     template<typename TYPE2, typename CONTAINER2> vector4( const FixedVector<TYPE2, 4, CONTAINER2> &src ) : FixedVector< TYPE, 4> ( src ) {}
00283     vector4( TYPE first, TYPE second, TYPE third = 0, TYPE fourth = 0 ) {
00284         this->operator[]( 3 ) = fourth;
00285         this->operator[]( 2 ) = third;
00286         this->operator[]( 1 ) = second;
00287         this->operator[]( 0 ) = first;
00288     }
00289 };

00291 template<typename TYPE, size_t SIZE, typename CONTAINER1, typename CONTAINER2>
00292 FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE> maxVector( const FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE, CONTAINER1> &first, const FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE, CONTAINER2> &second )
00293 {
00294     FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE> ret( first );
00295 
00296     for ( size_t i = 0; i < SIZE; i++ )
00297         if ( ret[i] < second[i] )ret[i] = second[i];
00298 
00299     return ret;
00300 }
00301 template<typename TYPE, size_t SIZE, typename CONTAINER1, typename CONTAINER2>
00302 FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE> minVector( const FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE, CONTAINER1> &first, const FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE, CONTAINER2> &second )
00303 {
00304     FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE> ret( first );
00305 
00306     for ( size_t i = 0; i < SIZE; i++ )
00307         if ( ret[i] > second[i] )ret[i] = second[i];
00308 
00309     return ret;
00310 }

00319 template<typename TYPE, size_t SIZE, typename CONTAINER >
00320 ::isis::util::FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE, CONTAINER> operator-( const ::isis::util::FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE, CONTAINER>& s )
00321 {
00322     return s.negate();
